request.description:
Start a new exam session or continue existing one. Returns a new token each time. The session token is automatically saved to the environment variable `session_token` for use in subsequent session requests.

**Note:** If a session already exists, it will be continued with a new token, and old tokens will be invalidated.

response.name: Session Continued
